title: FontAwesome should be updated (4.7 -> 5.3.1)
body:
many of the new glyphs are not available. It looks like the code should still be working, but the url has changed from:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FortAwesome/Font-Awesome/v4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css

to:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FortAwesome/Font-Awesome/master/web-fonts-with-css/css/fontawesome-all.min.css
